explanation: [0-0] A young woman in a red hoodie is sitting on a sofa, having a video call with someone. There is a white caption at the top of the screen: "Hey my phone is about to die l'll talk to you tmr".
[0-8] The woman is smiling, holding her phone in her left hand and chatting happily with the person on the other end. Her right hand waves gently, as if greeting the other person.
